name: Blood Souls
description:
Welcome to Blood Souls!

A 2D game heavily inspired by FromSoftware's trilogy: Dark Souls.

Controls:

A & D - Walk left / right respectively

S - Crouch

Spacebar - Jump

Double-tap A or D - Dash

Dash + Jump - Super Jump

MB1 - Attack combo 3x

MB2 (grounded) - Parry

E (after successful parry) - Riposte

MB2 (in air) - Air Attack

Left Shift - Roll

Q - Heal

To kill the boss, you must behead it! (Tip: Use super jump)
